verses.verse: And when <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> she bore Jacob no <S%H3205>children,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3290><s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> her <S%H269>sister;<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3051>Give<s%> me <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H369>else<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H7354>Rachel:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> Am <S%H595>I<s%> in <S%H430>God's<s%> <S%H8478>stead,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> hath <S%H4513>withheld<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb?<s%>

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> my <S%H519>maid<s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her; and she shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H1290>knees,<s%> that <S%H595>I<s%> may <S%H1571>also<s%> have <S%H1129>children<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> her.
And she <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> her <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> to <S%H802>wife:<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her.
And <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1777>judged<s%> me, and hath <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me a <S%H1121>son:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> she his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>
And <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel's<s%> <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> With <S%H430>great<s%> <S%H5319>wrestlings<s%> have I <S%H6617>wrestled<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> my <S%H269>sister,<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> I have <S%H3201>prevailed:<s%> and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>

When <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> she had <S%H5975>left<s%> <S%H4480>bearing,<s%> <S%H3205><s%> she <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> her <S%H8198>maid,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>
And <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> <S%H3812>Leah's<s%> <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>
And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> A troop <S%H1413>cometh:<s%> and she <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1410>Gad.<s%>
And <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> <S%H3812>Leah's<s%> <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H837>Happy<s%> am I, <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> will call me <S%H833>blessed:<s%> and she <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H836>Asher.<s%>

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3812>Leah.<s%> Then <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> of thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H4480>mandrakes.<s%> <S%H1736><s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, Is it a small <S%H4592>matter<s%> that thou hast <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H376>husband?<s%> and wouldest thou take <S%H3947>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> <S%H1571>also?<s%> And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3651>Therefore<s%> he shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee <S%H3915>tonight<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> Thou must come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me; <S%H3588>for<s%> surely I have <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H7936><s%> thee with my <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes.<s%> And he <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3915>night.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me my <S%H7939>hire,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> my <S%H8198>maiden<s%> to my <S%H376>husband:<s%> and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar.<s%>
And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H2064>endued<s%> me with a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2065>dowry;<s%> <S%H6471>now<s%> will my <S%H376>husband<s%> dwell <S%H2082>with<s%> me, <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H3205>born<s%> him <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons:<s%> and she <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>
And <S%H310>afterwards<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her, and <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H7358>womb.<s%>
And she <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son;<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath taken <S%H622>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> my reproach: <S%H2781><s%>
And she <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph;<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3254>add<s%> to me <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> Send me <S%H7971>away,<s%> that I may <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> mine own <S%H4725>place,<s%> and to my <S%H776>country.<s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853>me<s%> my <S%H802>wives<s%> and my <S%H3206>children,<s%> for <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H2004><s%> I have <S%H5647>served<s%> thee, and let me <S%H1980>go:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5656>service<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5647>done<s%> thee.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> tarry: for I have learned by <S%H5172>experience<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me for thy <S%H1558>sake.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5344>Appoint<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me thy <S%H7939>wages,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H859>Thou<s%> <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>how<s%> I have <S%H5647>served<s%> thee, and <S%H834>how<s%> thy <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me.

For <S%H3588><s%> it was <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H1961>hadst<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> I came, and it is now <S%H6555>increased<s%> unto a <S%H7230>multitude;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee since my <S%H7272>coming:<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H4970>when<s%> shall <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6213>provide<s%> for mine own <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1571>also?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall I <S%H5414>give<s%> thee? And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me any <S%H3972>thing:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou wilt <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> for me, I will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy flock: <S%H6629><s%>

I will pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> <S%H5493>removing<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> <S%H7716>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2345>brown<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%> among the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> and the <S%H2921>spotted<s%> and <S%H5348>speckled<s%> among the <S%H5795>goats:<s%> and of such shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H7939>hire.<s%>

So shall my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> for me in <S%H3117>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> my <S%H7939>hire<s%> before thy <S%H6440>face:<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> among the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> and <S%H2345>brown<s%> among the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> shall be counted <S%H1589>stolen<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me.
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I <S%H3863>would<s%> it might <S%H1961>be<s%> according to thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>

And he <S%H5493>removed<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H853><s%> the he <S%H8495>goats<s%> that were <S%H6124>ringstreaked<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the she <S%H5795>goats<s%> that were <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted,<s%> and every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> had some <S%H3836>white<s%> in it, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2345>brown<s%> among the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> himself and <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7462>fed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban's<s%> <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him <S%H4731>rods<s%> of <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H3839>poplar,<s%> and of the <S%H3869>hazel<s%> and chestnut <S%H6196>tree;<s%> and <S%H6478>peeled<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H6479>streaks<s%> in <S%H2004>them,<s%> and made the <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H4286>appear<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H4731>rods.<s%>

And he <S%H3322>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4731>rods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6478>peeled<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> in the <S%H7298>gutters<s%> in the <S%H4325>watering<s%> <S%H8268>troughs<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> that they should <S%H3179>conceive<s%> when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

And the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H3179>conceived<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> the <S%H4731>rods,<s%> and brought <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H6124>ringstreaked,<s%> <S%H5348>speckled,<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> did <S%H6504>separate<s%> the <S%H3775>lambs,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6124>ringstreaked,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2345>brown<s%> in the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban;<s%> and he <S%H7896>put<s%> his own <S%H5739>flocks<s%> by <S%H905>themselves,<s%> and <S%H7896>put<s%> them <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> <S%H3837>Laban's<s%> <S%H6629>cattle.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3605>whensoever<s%> the <S%H7194>stronger<s%> <S%H6629>cattle<s%> did <S%H3179>conceive,<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4731>rods<s%> before the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> in the <S%H7298>gutters,<s%> that they might <S%H3179>conceive<s%> among the <S%H4731>rods.<s%>

But when the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> were <S%H5848>feeble,<s%> he <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H3808>not<s%> in: so the <S%H5848>feebler<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H3837>Laban's,<s%> and the <S%H7194>stronger<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob's.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6555>increased<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly,<s%> <S%H3966><s%> and <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H6629>cattle,<s%> and <S%H8198>maidservants,<s%> and <S%H5650>menservants,<s%> and <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and <S%H2543>asses.<s%>
